normalised: Seriously, why does my medical bill always look like a phone number? Rupee nine billion eight hundred and seventy six million five hundred and forty three thousand two hundred and ten! I swear, last time I sneezed, it cost me rupee five thousand. And don't even get me started on the "consultation fee" - rupee two thousand five hundred for ten minutes? My chai wala charges less for life advice! Guess I'll just sell a kidney to pay this bill. Anyone need one? Only used for thirty years, mint condition. Negotiable at rupee seven million.
